# SRWristTemperatureSession

**Class**

An object that represents wrist temperatures that a device records during a period of time.

## Declaration

```swift
class SRWristTemperatureSession
```

## Overview

Use the [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRWristTemperatureSession/startDate] and [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRWristTemperatureSession/duration] properties to get the range of time of the measurements. Use the [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRWristTemperatureSession/temperatures-8bqrl] property to get the sequence of measurements.

## Getting session information

- **startDate**: The time that the device records the wrist temperature.
- **duration**: The number of seconds that the device records the temperature.
- **version**: The version of the algorithm that analyzes the temperature.

## Getting recorded temperatures

- **temperatures**: The wrist temperatures and their accuracies.

## Recording wrist temperatures

- **SRWristTemperature**: The temperature of the user’s wrist while the user sleeps.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
